numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The results come from a survey.
2. The survey was done during the Covid-19 pandemic.
3. The purpose of the survey was to measure how different generations cope with the global situation.
4. Some scientists want to analyze optimism in young people.
5. Some other people are interested in this topic.
6. This data can support a conclusion.
7. Optimism can vary because of events that a person experienced in the lifetime of the person.
8. Optimism can vary if the living standards of the person increased significantly.
9. The data was collected to analyze how individuals from different backgrounds cope with the Covid-19 pandemic.
10. The data was collected to identify potential causes of concern about the future.
11. The data is presented as a two-variable scatter chart.
12. The scatter chart contains many data points.
13. The data points come from a diverse selection of locations.
14. The data points come from a diverse selection of economic backgrounds.
